pages.heading: Slow-burning Oil
pages.text: Uses heat to smelt harvested blocks. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Slow-burning Oil L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (1024 blocks)

pages.heading: Slow-burning Oil XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (4096 blocks)
